name: addChannelToRoom
shortDescription: Assigns a channel to a room
description: This method assigns a channel to a room. If a room already is assigned to the channel this assignment is overwritten.
signatures: Boolean addChannelToRoom(Integer peerId, Integer channel, Integer roomId)

parameters.name: peerId
parameters.description: The ID of the peer to assign to the room.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: The channel of the peer to assign to the room.

parameters.name: roomId
parameters.description: The ID of the room as returned by createRoom() or getRooms().

returnValue: Returns true on success and false on errors (e. g. unknown channel).
